name: Then another
description:
A short puzzlescript game about spawning blocks that try and copy the players movement and act as obstacles.

Mobile friendly version: https://www.puzzlescript.net/play.html?p=f33ae31669a4accf93ae641386dbfc5b

Source code: https://www.puzzlescript.net/editor.html?hack=f33ae31669a4accf93ae641386dbfc5b

(Part of my daily puzzlescript creations. Visit my page for more or go here: https://itch.io/c/337780/my-puzzlescript-games)
